title: Document QueryParser's boolean precedence ignorance
description: Please add to the JavaDocs that the QueryParser does not handle boolean preference with AND/OR. This confuses developers in the way the understand boolean terms with AND. As mentioned by Uwe Schindler. This issue is connected with LUCENE-3674.

comments.content: Where is the difference to the previous issue? It's both about documenting the same thing and pointing user to PrecedenceQueryParser.
comments.author: Uwe Schindler
